question: Celiac disease has been associated with diseases such as type 1 diabetes mellitus, Williams syndrome, dermatitis herpetiformis, selective IgA deficiency, thyroid autoimmune disease, autoimmune hepatitis, trisomy 21, exocrine pancreas insufficiency, cystic fibrosis, alpha-1-antitrypsin deficiency, and inflammatory bowel disease.
title: MANY OF THE LUPUS SYMPTOMS ARE CAUSED BY CELIAC DISEASE
